00417 typedef struct {
00418     enum {
00419         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00420         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00421         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00422         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00423         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00424     } type;
00425     union {
00426         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00427         struct {
00428             UA_Connection *connection;
00429             UA_ByteString message;
00430         } binaryMessage;
00431         struct {
00432             void *data;
00433             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00434         } methodCall;
00435     } job;
00436 } UA_Job;
00437
